name: SurviveTheNight
description:
All the resources used in this game are owned by Scout Cawthon.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Time to experience another Fnaf fan game: SurviveTheNight

You've got to know the principles by now(if you're a fan, of course) but i'll go through them once again.

1. Use the lights and check if there's any animatronics nearby

2. If so, close the doors and wait for them to go

3. Don't forget that there's a power limit, so use your lights/doors when it's absolutely necessary

4. Listening for foot steps might be helpfull🙂

5. Be aware that there is no camera system

5. And finally survive the night and get the hell out of there!

Once you played the game, i'd be grateful if you leave a comment about how the game and especially how the animatronics AI was.

Enjoy :D
